documents.document: @SenBennetCO you missed a wee typo: "qualified" not "qualifed"

Another trip, another round of fun with the cats and @Petcube. Love this thing.
cat (n): a four-legged furry creature that knocks your stuff onto the floor just to see what happens
@CarlEdman @charlescwcooke @justinamash but that was before my political awakening.

I'm on the road, jet-lagged, and playing with my cats with my @Petcube. I wasn't sure about it at first, but now I love it. Audio, ftw.
@flameeyes SFO this time.
@flameeyes safe flight. it's to the wilds of MTV for me
@flameeyes are you in LHR T5?
I find myself surrounded by my people. And by "my people," I mean frequent flyers.
@lkozloff ah yes, that's what I like about it too
@lkozloff what do you like about it?
@gerrowadat Bellroy wallets are good, so I've heard
@gerrowadat can you not, you know, direct the market as you see fit? ;)
@SenCoryGardner that's a nice idea but Congressional GOP have been more about talking points than action.
@k9 yep, turns out globalisation is a thing. challenge != win, though.
@k9 troubling to be sure, but govt action can be less noble. cuts both ways. I think the ISDS process needs results before judgment
@k9 I imagine it's to level the field against capricious actions from a national govt out of spirit with the trade agreement.
@ajkilbane all the best, you'll be missed!
Redbreast Lustau: syrupy creamy sweet and popcorn. Not overpowering. Very good. #celticwhiskey
Redbreast 12, a near perfect whiskey. #celticwhiskey
12 yo: vanilla lychee and green tea. NAS: indistinct barley sugar and astringent #celticwhiskey
First week back at work: brought in the Palace Bar 12 year old (port cask) for Gentlefolk. Bottle proved to be extremely popular.
@warriorbob9 try a puff of air in the Glencairn to dissipate the vapo/u?/r. should help with nosing
@warriorbob9 I'm still trying to decide. It has some upsides (especially for higher-proof) but I think I'd still default to Glencairn.
2 days with a Norlan whisky glass: seems to strongly subdue alcohol vapour vs. Glencairn. Wide lip takes a bit of getting used to.
12 years in port, Palace Bar Literary edition is class. #iwsibs
Independent bottler evening with the IWS, excited! #iwsibs #iws #whiskey

Sky are like the overly attached girlfriend. Cancel and they try 17 ways to keep you. Then when they fail, they send a "we're sad" letter.
@flameeyes I managed, after much pushing to get the savings and current accounts closed. The credit card is proving vexing.
KBC now claims the card is actually really honestly truly closed this time. We'll see. #notconvinced
If I have to hear "Thank you for calling KBC" again after ringing 6(!) times to close my account, I might lose it.
@cgpgrey I thought you should know: 2xHello Internet, 2xCortex was about right for yesterday's long haul flight. :-)
@_phred thanks for the link. btw, +1 to the notion of a check character and separating id from human identifier. :)
@_phred in this case, any randomised string will do (collisions can be verified by index, distribution handled by a prefix)
@_phred if you really want human factors, you go alphanumeric (e.g; tinyurl, bitly, imgur) where you can create shorter strings
@_phred that sounds like a terrible idea. uuid's are just for this and come from the standard book of magic that everyone understands.
@crashcoursestan @TheCrashCourse I am very much enjoying the IP series. Well presented to make the material accessible and fun. Thanks!
